scripts.start:heroku: cd server && yarn install && NODE_ENV=production yarn start
scripts.deploy:heroku: cat client/heroku.gitignore > client/.gitignore && yarn build:client && git add client/build/* && git add client/.gitignore && git commit -m 'client build' && git push heroku master -f && git reset HEAD^ && cat client/base.gitignore > client/.gitignore
